item.description:
Anyone up for a hike at Benson Park.  There is 2.5 mile trail that I would like to do.  It looks like we will have to double back, so in total it might be a 3.5 mile hike.  I haven't done this in a long time so I can't say how long it would take.  I can say I will be in a rush as I will have my camera!

 

Bring a good snack or lunch and a bottle of water.  We can either stop along the way for a break or eat after.  I'll even bring a frisbee  and volleyball if we have time and there somewhere to play.

Let's enjoy the day!  I see full sun and 50 degrees.  Yeah!!!

I've heard we can only have a small group, so if a lot of people show up we will split up and meet for lunch after.

Cell - 978-340-3381. please only use the day of the event.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Hike at Benson Park
